params._rewardEpochId: Reward epoch id. **NOTE:** fee percentage might still change for the `current + feePercentageUpdateOffset` reward epoch id

returns._feePercentageBIPS: Positional array of fee percentages in BIPS.
returns._fixed: Positional array of boolean values indicating if settings are subjected to change.
returns._validFromEpochId: Positional array of reward epoch ids the fee setings are effective from.

params._feePercentageBIPS: Number representing fee percentage in BIPS.

returns._0: Returns the reward epoch number when the value becomes effective.

feePercentageUpdateOffset().notice: The offset in reward epochs for the fee percentage value to become effective.

getVoterCurrentFeePercentage(address).notice: Returns the current fee percentage of `_voter`.

getVoterFeePercentage(address,uint256).notice: Returns the fee percentage of `_voter` for given reward epoch id.

getVoterScheduledFeePercentageChanges(ad.notice: Returns the scheduled fee percentage changes of `_voter`.

setVoterFeePercentage(uint16).notice: Allows voter to set (or update last) fee percentage.
